title: A Bed of Knives
description: A Bed of Knives - contemporary romance with an edge.Friendship can get complicated when you start to fancy the guys you hang out with. When Eddie suggests a night out to celebrate the end of their final exams, four friends look forward to the evening with different expectations.Fast forward five years. Gina and Rose rescue Spider from living rough in Oxford. Is this enough to bring all four of them together again? Can love and friendship overcome the revelations of the following days.***Not erotica, but does contains strong language and explicit sex***
author: Elizabeth Jasper
